summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department and authorizing an agreement with the United States of America to construct, operate and maintain for a period of ten years of power transmission line right of way over and across the City's diversion ditch right of way and pipeline right of way in Section 5, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W. M. and aqueduct right of way in Section 13, Township 22 North, Range 5 East, W. M.
